fields.title: Level 1 Explorer
fields.description: Your journey begins here — welcome to Summit Study!

fields.title: Level 2 Trailblazer
fields.description: You have taken your first few steps on the path of knowledge.

fields.title: Level 3 Pathfinder
fields.description: You are making steady progress — keep moving forward!

fields.title: Level 5 Knowledge Seeker
fields.description: A strong foundation has been built — you're becoming unstoppable.

fields.title: Level 10 Scholar
fields.description: Your dedication is paying off — you're reaching new heights.

fields.title: Level 15 Brainstormer
fields.description: Your ideas are sharp and your persistence shines.

fields.title: Level 20 Innovator
fields.description: Your creativity and effort set you apart.

fields.title: Level 25 Deep Thinker
fields.description: You are going beyond surface knowledge and into mastery.

fields.title: Level 30 Knowledge Builder
fields.description: You are building something extraordinary with every step.

fields.title: Level 40 Rising Star
fields.description: Your skills shine bright as you reach new milestones.

fields.title: Level 50 Halfway Hero
fields.description: Halfway to greatness — you have proven your determination.

fields.title: Level 60 Knowledge Guardian
fields.description: You guard the wisdom you have earned and share it with others.

fields.title: Level 70 Wisdom Seeker
fields.description: Your path is guided by curiosity and wisdom.

fields.title: Level 80 Mastermind
fields.description: You are unlocking deeper layers of mastery.

fields.title: Level 90 Visionary
fields.description: You see connections others might miss — your vision is clear.

fields.title: Level 100 Knowledge Titan
fields.description: A century of levels reached — an unstoppable force of learning.

fields.title: Level 150 Galaxy Thinker
fields.description: Your knowledge extends beyond boundaries — a galactic mind.

fields.title: Level 200 Galactic Genius
fields.description: You have achieved mastery across galaxies of knowledge.

fields.title: Level 300 Cosmic Sage
fields.description: Your wisdom echoes across the universe.

fields.title: Level 500 Summit Master
fields.description: You have conquered the summit of Summit Study itself.
